inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Missing psychological assessment; X‑ray; CT follow‑up.
Visit structure: Should be V1 Initial Evaluation; V2 Post‑MRI/CI candidacy; V3 Surgery; V4 Post‑Activation; V5 5‑Year Follow‑up.

logic_summary: Updated ordered_list to include Psychological assessment, Plain film X-ray, and CT scan as requested.
Restructured expected_interpretations_by_visit into 5 visits (V1-V5) to reflect the clinical flow: Initial, Candidacy, Surgery, Post-Activation, and 5-Year Follow-up.
Moved Vestibular Assessment to V2 as per text indicating it was part of the candidacy evaluation.
Added specific test results for the new visits (NRT, X-ray, HINT, AzBio, CT).

value.rationale_short: To assess degree and configuration of hearing loss.
To determine speech awareness thresholds given profound loss.
To evaluate for retrocochlear lesions given sudden loss and history of VS.
To evaluate aided performance for CI candidacy (HINT).
To assess vestibular function given reports of imbalance and bilateral pathology.
To assess motivation, expectations, and mental health suitability for CI.
To monitor tumor growth and internal device status at long-term follow-up.

value.collective_interpretation: Initial audiometric testing revealed bilateral profound SNHL. MRI confirmed bilateral vestibular schwannomas consistent with NF2.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Bilateral profound SNHL; no response at limits.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: Left SAT 100 dB HL; Right No Response.

tests.name: Diagnostic Imaging (MRI)
tests.result_summary: Bilateral vestibular schwannomas; Left 1.8 cm (filling IAC), Right 4.4 mm (intracanalicular).

value.collective_interpretation: Candidacy evaluation confirmed poor aided benefit and bilateral vestibular hypofunction. Psychological assessment cleared patient for surgery.

tests.name: Vestibular Assessment
tests.result_summary: Absent cVEMPs bilaterally; no measurable caloric responses (bilateral hypofunction).

tests.name: Psychological assessment
tests.result_summary: Minimal risk of depression; realistic expectations; appropriate motivation.

value.collective_interpretation: Successful implantation of right ear. No neural response on NRT, but placement confirmed.
Early post-activation showed significant improvement in speech recognition despite lack of NRT.

tests.name: Speech recognition (HINT)
tests.result_summary: Improved to 88% in quiet within several months.

tests.name: Mapping
tests.result_summary: Stable impedances; normal morphology on AutoNRT (later).

value.collective_interpretation: Long-term follow-up showed sustained benefit and no tumor growth.

tests.name: Speech recognition (AzBio)
tests.result_summary: 81% in quiet; 37% in noise (+10 dB SNR).
